text: Hello! I'm new into HubSpot Development, want to create application which will add button on the right panel of the contact view and when click it open the chat. Could anybody please help me, how to do this?

hi! is there a way to fix and apply this on HubSpot pages/templates in one go? <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/61992025/google-chrome-showing-black-border-on-focus-state-for-button-user-agent-styles> its appearing to anything that is clickable (buttons, forms, hyperlinks etc)
